plots.plot_ivs_scheme¶

plots.plot_ivs_scheme(trace_pair: TracePair, hold_trace: HoldTrace, main_colors=('cornflowerblue', 'indianred'), accent_colors=('royalblue', 'firebrick'), smoothing: int = 1)¶
